PHRASE.LANG: This bundle contains 4 avatar animation packs: the Modern Country dance, the Cha-cha step, the High School dance, and the Noughties dance moves collection, itself consisting of the Heel-Toe move, the "Pop, lock and drop it" move, and Krumping. [#Legal]

Ce bundle contient 4 packs d'animations d'avatars: la danse Country moderne, le pas Cha-cha, la Danse de la lycéenne, et les Danses des années 2000, elles-mêmes comportant le Heel-toe, "Pop, lock and drop it", et le Krumping. [#Legal]
Dieses Bundle enthält 4 Animationen: die Country Tanz, die Cha-cha Tanz, die Tanz der Gymnasiast, und die Tänze der 2000er Jahre (Heel-Toe, "Pop, Lock-and-Drop it" und Krumping).[#Legal]
Questo bundle contiene 4 animazioni: la danza "Country", la danza Cha-cha, la danza del liceo e le Danze degli anni 2000, si contiene il Heel-toe, "Pop, Lock and drop it", e il Krumping. [#Legal]

Este bundle contiene 4 animaciones: la danza "Country", la danza Cha-cha, la danza de la colegiala y las danzas de la década de 2000, mismos que contiene Heel-Toe, "Pop, Lock-and-Drop", y la Krumping. [#Legal]

This bundle contains 4 avatar animation packs: the Modern Country dance, the Cha-cha step, the High School dance, and the Noughties dance moves collection, itself consisting of the Heel-Toe move, the "Pop, lock and drop it" move, and Krumping. [#Legal]
